title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of chaos (All 3 Games) Compressed
description:
-to play the game, extract the Power of Chaos folder to your program files folder. then open it and look for joey's folder, look for joey_pc.exe and make a shortcut from it, paste it in your desktop then run it and get playing!


-Join my community   <a href=" http://powerofchaos.forumotion.net/forum.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://powerofchaos.forumotion.net/forum.htm</a>
There you will be able to chat, post comments, get ranks, duel other people, get answers if you are having trouble with the game and much more


-if you are having problems with the game, go to the forum and look for the link about how to get all cards (you wont be having any problems if you have all cards) and watch my video.
 
please seed the torrent
